properties.displayName: Workbooks should be saved to storage accounts that you control
properties.description: With bring your own storage (BYOS), your workbooks are uploaded into a storage account that you control. That means you control the encryption-at-rest policy, the lifetime management policy, and network access. You will, however, be responsible for the costs associated with that storage account. For more information, visit https://aka.ms/workbooksByos
